text: allahvaiyanri (veru) etanaiyum ninkal vanankatirkal" enru avarkalukku munnalum, pinnalum avarkalitam tutarkal vanta potu"enkal iraivan natiyiruntal avan malakkukalai(t tutarkalaka) irakkiyiruppan. Akavetan, ninkal etanaikkontu anuppappattirukkirirkalo atanai nankal niccayamaka nirakarikkirom" enru connarkal
